title: Compile error -'loadsys' undeclared here (not in a function)
body:
by **Konrad.Nowicki**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.Run $GOROOT/src/all.bash

What is the expected output?
Expected:
--- cd ../test
N known bugs; 0 unexpected bugs


What do you see instead?
$GOROOT/src/cmd/gc/yerr.h:17: error: 'loadsys' undeclared here (not in a function)
make: *** [subr.o] Error 1
make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
GOOS=windows
GOARCH=386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
gowin32_2010-08-11.zip

Please provide any additional information below.
win xp,GNU bison 2.4.1, GCC 4.4.0, GNU Awk 3.1.5, GNU Ed 1.2     

I found another issue already cloesed.
https://golang.org/issue/626
yerr.h looks the same as in issue
y.output is in english
Changes from issue are already in makefile. But error still apears.

Thanks.
